Package com.github.jazzschmidt.apubsub

package com.github.jazzschmidt.apubsub
Serves the major components of the server module. The namespaces were not nested deeply in order to remain with a more concise hierarchy.

The entry point for STOMP messages is the MessageController, that handles registration and broadcasting.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.github.jazzschmidt.apubsub.config
    Holds all major configurations beans for the web application.
    com.github.jazzschmidt.apubsub.events
    Classes that inform about an important event, such as a currently connecting client.
    com.github.jazzschmidt.apubsub.interceptor
    These ChannelInterceptor modules process incoming STOMP messages.
    com.github.jazzschmidt.apubsub.messages
    Holds all message types that are being exchanged between the clients and the server.
  • Class
    Description
    ClientEventListener
    Main ApplicationListener that routes the ClientRegisteredEvent, ClientUnregisteredEvent, and ClientDisconnectedEvent either to the NotificationService or the ClientRegistrations in order to announce connecting and disconnecting clients as Notification.
    ClientRegistrations
    Associates and disassociates client names with their STOMP session id and publishes respective events, so that other components can react to new connected or leaving clients.
    MessageController
    Handles incoming STOMP messages that were routed to the app path.
    NotificationService
    Broadcasts Notification messages to all clients.
    ServerApplication
     
    UnregisteredClientException
    Indicates that no client name is associated with the given STOMP session id
